item.title: Connie add a quote by Michael Chabon
item.description: "Never say love is "like" anything... It isn't." -- Michael Chabon

item.title: Connie add a quote by Stephen Crane
Connie add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Connie add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Connie add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Connie add a quote by Dennis Miller
item.description: "A developer is someone who wants to build a house in the woods. An environmentalist is someone who already has a house in the woods." -- Dennis Miller

item.title: Connie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everything must be made as simple as possible. But not simpler." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Connie add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Argue not concerning God,…re-examine all that you have been told at church or school or in any book, dismiss whatever insults your soul…" -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Connie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Connie add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Connie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at the moment." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Connie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Connie add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Connie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Connie add a quote by Leslie Marmon Silko
item.description: "I will tell you something about stories . . . They aren't just entertainment. Don't be fooled. They are all we have, you see, all we have to fight off illness and death." -- Leslie Marmon Silko

item.title: Connie add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "You cannot find peace by avoiding life." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Connie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Connie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The difference between the right word and the almost right word is the difference between lightning and a lightning bug." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Connie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Connie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "We lay there and looked up at the night sky and she told me about stars called blue squares and red swirls and I told her I'd never heard of them. Of course not, she said, the really important stuff they never tell you. You have to imagine it on your own." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Connie add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Connie add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Connie add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Connie add a quote by Booker T. Washington
item.description: "You can't hold a man down without staying down with him." -- Booker T. Washington

item.title: Connie add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Poetry is a life-cherishing force. For poems are not words, after all, but fires for the cold, ropes let down to the lost, something as necessary as bread in the pockets of the hungry." -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Connie add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Not only the thirsty seek the water, the water as well seeks the thirsty." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Connie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is hard enough to remember my opinions, without also remembering my reasons for them!" -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Connie add a quote by Dr. Phil
item.description: "You wouldnt care so much about what people think about you if you knew how little they did" -- Dr. Phil

item.title: Connie add a quote by Phil McGraw
item.description: "When you allow a person's words to upset you, you're giving away your power." -- Phil McGraw

item.title: Connie add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge." -- Eckhart Tolle
